content: knitted in sleek stockinette the chiro fingerless mittens offer a versatile and timeless accessory that pairs effortlessly with both minimalist and textured knits **sizes and fit ** one size designed to fit a hand circumference of 17 cm / 6 75 in **gauge ** 26 st x 35 row equals 10 x 10cm / 4 x 4 inches in stockinette washed and blocked **needles ** 3 mm / us 2 5 circular needles **yarn suggestion ** light fingering + lace held together 120 +100 m fine sock by litlg in colour night 425m/100gr 120 m + premia by lamana in colour anthracite 04 300m/25gr 100 m **workflow ** you ll start by knitting the main body then work back and forth to create the thumb opening after that the pieces are rejoined and the rest of the glove is knit in the round ribbing at the wrist is done without the mohair to avoid any irritation once the thumb stitches are picked up the cap for the finger is shaped using german short row finally the glove is finished with a simple cast-off and the 2x2 ribbing gets a clean finish with a 2x2 tubular bind-off **social media ** feel free to share your photos on ravelry and on instagram and tag me in your post so i can share it in my stories see more photos of the garment on instagram using the hashtag #chirofingerlessmittens
